name: Re:BF
description:
[Overview]
Following on from our renowned ROBF series, we present to you a new Battle Fuck experience

[System]

of lewd short animation clips illustriously illustrating the sexy battles as they unfold.

[Story]

The only method to subjugate these monster girls... expert sexual technique!

To cum or make cum, that is the question.
But beware, should you succummmmb to pleasure,
these creatures of lewdness will wring you dry... to your death.

Now, set off on your journey young man, and stand up erec... ahem for what is right!

[Other]
- Over 40 different enemy characters (60+ including color variants of the same monster girl)
